about.title: Who We Are
about.description: MoonWhale is a creative digital agency focused on delivering exceptional results for our clients. With expertise spanning web, mobile, and design, we turn ideas into impactful digital experiences.
about.label: WHO IS MOONWHALE?

headline.part1: MOONWHALE IS IRAQ'S FIRST AI‑NATIVE TECHNOLOGY STUDIO ON A MISSION TO REDEFINE HOW PEOPLE WORK, LEARN, AND LIVE. WE MERGE DEEP‑SEA EXPERTISE
headline.part3: TO DESIGN AND ENGINEER AI‑POWERED PRODUCTS THAT MAKE MODERN LIFE SMARTER, FASTER, AND MORE HUMAN.

about.subline: We turn sparks into software—combining intelligent automation, beautiful interfaces, and immersive learning to solve real‑world problems for individuals, startups, and enterprises alike.

mission.label: MISSION
mission.text: Create digital experiences that don't just keep up with the world but push it forward—making transformative technology accessible, impactful, and intuitively human.

vision.label: VISION
vision.text: A future where AI is woven into everyday life, elevating Iraq—and the globe—through engaging products and services that reshape how we work, learn, and connect.

headline.part1: WE FUSE WHALE-DEEP EXPERTISE IN AI, DESIGN, AND ENGINEERING TO TURN RAW IDEAS INTO SCALABLE DIGITAL PRODUCTS.
headline.part2: FROM LIGHTNING-FAST NO-CODE LAUNCH PAGES TO ENTERPRISE-GRADE PLATFORMS AND BESPOKE AI MODELS, WE CRAFT EXPERIENCES THAT CAPTIVATE, CONVERT, AND KEEP EVOLVING.
headline.part3: BORN IN MESOPOTAMIA, OUR WORK CARRIES THE FIRE OF IRAQ'S INNOVATION TO CLIENTS WHO DEMAND RESULTS BEYOND THE ORDINARY.

work.title: Our Work
work.description: Explore our latest projects and see how we've helped businesses achieve their goals

testimonial1.text: MoonWhale transformed our digital presence with an innovative approach that perfectly captured our brand vision while delivering exceptional results.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: Working with MoonWhale was a game-changer for our business. Their team's expertise and dedication helped us reach new heights.
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

contact.title: Ready to Start Your Project?

whaleMessage.line1: From the Deep Blue to Deep Space
